remarks: The set of eigenvectors of a Hilbert space operator.  (Contributed by NM, 11-Mar-2006.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 16-Nov-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
eigvecval $p |- ( T : ~H --> ~H -> ( eigvec ` T ) = { x e. ( ~H \ 0H ) | E. y e. CC ( T ` x ) = ( y .h x ) } ) $.
$d T x y $.
